content.title: You need to pay the fee
content.info: Your application has been submitted, but won't be processed until you have paid the fee.
content.pay: If you need to make any changes to your application you’ll need to contact the divorce centre on {{courtPhoneNumber}} (from {{courtOpeningHour}}).
